content:
You see, my friend, this toaster is more than just toast,
It's an opportunity to spread the word of Jehovah most,
You see, as a Jehovah's Witness, it's my duty and goal,
To spread the good news, and to help others to know,

This toaster is just a tool, a means to an end,
A way to start a conversation and become a friend,
So even though you're not interested in the toaster itself,
I hope you can see the bigger picture, and the wealth,

Of knowledge and love that Jehovah brings,
It's something that truly makes the heart sing,
So even though you're not interested in the toaster,
I hope you'll keep an open mind and give Jehovah a chance to foster.
